verses.verse: {A Solomonic Song of Ascents} {God's Blessing in the Family} d Unless the Lord builds the house, its builders labor uselessly. Unless the Lord guards the city, its security forces keep watch uselessly.
It is useless to get up early and to stay up late, {Lit. delay sitting} eating the food of exhausting labor truly he gives sleep to those he loves.
Children {Lit . Sons} are a gift {Lit. heritage} from the Lord ; a productive womb, the Lord's {The Heb. lacks Lord's} reward.
As arrows in the hand of a warrior, so also are children {Lit. sons} born during one's {The Heb. lacks born during one's} youth.
How blessed {Or happy} is the man whose quiver is full of them! He {Lit. They} will not be ashamed as they confront their enemies at the city gate.
